data.message: We are needing Tim and Jake Music Facebook page verified so we can use the mentions application to livestream concerts.  Thank you!

replies.message: Hey Kim. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/1ST05QL. -Jordan

Facebook   Yes they are eligible.  Tim and Jake Music are Nashville recording artist. We have sent all the legal documentation you requested. Can you please help facilitate this so we can use your mentions app.  Thanks  kim
